name: Exquisite Corpse Jam - March '18
description:
Here For Sale Are 8 Games Created By 8 Game "Developers" Over The Course Of 4 Hours. Each Participant Started With A Blank Unity Or Twine Project And Worked For 30 Minutes With No Prompt, At Which Point They Rotated One Computer Clockwise And Continued Where Their Neighbor Had Left Off. After 6 Total Iterations, These 8 Media Artifacts Are The Despicable Result.
